thread.title: Kendall Jenner and Gigi Hadid Partied in Balmain
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner and Gigi Hadid Partied in Balmain -- The Cut

author: Stephanie Eckardt
title: Kendall Jenner and Gigi Hadid Partied in Balmain
text:
View Slideshow Joan Smalls, Lily Donaldson, Kendall Jenner, Mohamed Sultan, Alessandra Ambrosio, and another partygoer. Photo: Jacopo Raule/Getty Images
Now that the weekend is approaching, Paris Fashion Week's parties are ramping up: Karl Lagerfeld and Catherine Baba celebrated the new Dior Homme boutique on Thursday, and Olivier Rousteing hosted Balmain 's after-party, which accommodated his whole army of models in their Balmain best. Gigi Hadid blended in with Kendall Jenner and Joan Smalls in neutrals, while her sister, Bella , wore the model-traditional black, matching more seasoned faces like Lindsey Wixson , Constance Jablonski , Daria Strokous , and Kasia Struss . Cool women Kris Jenner and Jada Pinkett Smith hung out, too, getting close with Rousteing like Alessandra Ambrosio , who bounced around in a short dress and white cape.
Click through the slideshow to see those and more highlights from Paris Fashion Week's parties, including Carine Roitfeld and a pink-haired Jared Leto.
BEGIN SLIDESHOW
